data.title: NetEase Games
data.meta_description: NetEase Games, the online games division of NetEase, Inc. (NASDAQ: NTES and HKEX: 9999), is a leading global developer and publisher of video game IP across a variety of genres and platforms. NetEase Gamesâ development and publishing slate include titles such as Knives Out, Harry Potter: Magic Awakened, and Naraka: Bladepoint, and partnerships with major entertainment brands such as Warner Bros and Mojang AB (a Microsoft subsidiary). NetEase Games also supports the growth and development of its innovative global studios in Canada, Europe, Japan and the United States. For more information, please visit https://www.neteasegames.com/
data.text:
Address

3 Siyun Road Tianhe District Guangzhou, 510665, P.R.C

China

NetEase Games

Address

Hongqiao World Center, 1588 Zhuguang Road, Qingpu District, Shanghai, 201106, P.R.C

Address

CEC Belling Building, 810 Yishan Rd, Xuhui District, Shanghai, 200233, P.R.C

China

NetEase Games

Address

3 Siyun Road Tianhe District Guangzhou, 510665, P.R.C

Ouka Studio

Address

Shibuya Infoss Tower 4F, 20-1 Sakuragaoka-cho, Shibuya-ku Tokyo, 150-0031 & No.16 Keyun Road, Tianhe District, Guangzhou, P.R.C

Introduction

"Ouka Studios" was established by NetEase Games under the leadership of a Japanese studio head. This will be NetEase Games' first development studio whose main purpose is "console video game production". At our two bases in Guangzhou, China and newly established Shibuya, Tokyo site, we will utilize the strengths and technical capabilities of creators from both Japan and China to create next-generation console games as well as smartphone games that become mainstream of the industry from 2021 onward.

South Korea

NetEase Games South Korea Office

Address

First Tower F7, 55 Bundang Rd, Bundang-Gu, Seongnam, Gyeonggi-do

Introduction

NetEase Games Korean Office is mainly focused on business development, art, R&D, and others. It is responsible for exploring excellent Korean games while developing various types of mobile games. Upholding to NetEase Games's philosophy of "Driving Innovation with Ingenuity", our team in South Korea always strives to achieve business localization and building a positive working environment where all employees are able to work on what they excel in.

Japan

Nagoshi Studio Inc.

Address

Ebisu SS building 5F, 4-3-14 Ebisu, Shibuya-ku Tokyo, 150-0013

Introduction

Introduction: Nagoshi Studio Inc. is a game software development company and wholly owned subsidiary of NetEase Games. It develops high-end titles for worldwide release, with a primary focus on the console software business.

Grasshopper Manufacture Inc.

Address

Koraku Mori building 13F, 1-4-14 koraku, Bunkyo-ku, Tokyo, 112-0004

Introduction

Grasshopper Manufacture Inc., a member of the NetEase Games Group, is a video game development studio based in Bunkyo-ku, Tokyo. GRASSHOPPER MANUFACTURE was founded in 1998 by CEO Goichi Suda (SUDA51), who is known around the world for his distinctive style and innovative work as a game designer and scenario writer.

NetEase Games Tokyo Office

Address

26F Shinjuku OakTower,6-8-1 Nishishinjuku, Shinjuku-Ku, Tokyo 163-6004, Japan

Introduction

NetEase Games Tokyo Office is a key local development organization in Japan that provides business support for the headquarter in art, business, game distribution, localization, investment, and cooperation. The office was established for the purpose of giving players in Japan products that satisfy their local preferences. Beyond that, we will continue offering a better gaming experience to players around the world with dedication.

Singapore

NetEase Games Singapore Office

Address

128 Beach Road, #19-01 Guoco MidTown, Singapore 189773

Introduction

Introduction: For our office located in Singapore, we are in charge of game publishing mainly in Southeast Asia areas and global gaming investments. We closely work with our game development and marketing teams to publish various games from both our own game studios and external game studios. Here at NetEase Games, we offer you a creative environment for your bright ideas to come true. We are looking for talented people who are passionate about games, and eager to bring the best quality games to the world. Join us and work as a team together with integrity, collaboration and responsibility.

UK

NetEase Games UK Office

Introduction

NetEase Games UK Office was established in 2019, focusing on business development and global production, aiming to bring more vitality into NetEase Gamesâ global business.

Canada

NetEase Games Canada Office

Introduction

NetEase Games Vancouver office was founded in 2020. Vancouver is Canada's major port and an important global economic center. The office focuses on business development and global production, aiming to bring more vitality into NetEase Gamesâ global business.

Canada

NetEase Games Canada Office

Address

2020 Bd Robert-Bourassa Bureau 2000, MontrÃ©al, QC H3A 2A5, Canada

Introduction

Introduction: NetEase Games MontrÃ©al as a studio located in Quebec, Canada, dedicates to bring top-quality games to international markets, which is part of the corporate global strategies. We warmly seek collaboration with talents around the world to produce masterpieces through innovation and inspiration.

United States

NetEase Games North America Office

Address

790 East Colorado Boulevard, Suite 280, Pasadena, California 91101

Introduction

NetEase Game North America Office is in charge of business development, art, R&D, etc. We also support local 1st party studios. NetEase has been working with the local developers and gamer community and supporting innovative talents. NetEase Games is committed to bringing better interactive entertainment experience for players around the world.
